title: A New Menu for the Beach House!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>I was thinking of making a special menu for the beach house this year. Kanata-chan, can you help me come up with some ideas?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Huh, can I really help!? I love coming up with menus~! Let’s do it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, that’s very reassuring.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>So what have you thought of so far?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Things like yakisoba, takoyaki, and shaved ice. I wonder if people would want teppanyaki dishes…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Teppanyaki, huh~... How about getting fresh fish and shellfish and making seafood skewers out of them? The ingredients would be easy to handle, and you could cook stuff like yakisoba alongside them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Seafood skewers, huh? Good idea! Thinking about how to handle the ingredients shows that you know food coordination well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I make sure never to waste food~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha! But I agree, that’s really important! Alright, so for our sweet dish, how about freshly squeezed juice? If we squeeze the juice out after ordering it, that wouldn’t be wasteful, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Wow, that looks good! I want to come try it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
